synopsis.text: Seiran Island, a picturesque haven where an unusual law permits residents to indulge in their deepest desires. However, not everyone is content with this libertine paradise. A secret society known as NLNS, led by Junnosuke Tachibana, is determined to overthrow this controversial law. With the support of an anonymous wealthy patron who provides them with a hidden base and ample funds, the NLNS embarks on a mission to find and protect a mysterious girl who holds the key to their success. All the while, they must stay one step ahead of the SHO, who are hot on their trail. Junnosuke Tachibana is resolute in his quest to bring down the law, and he won't rest until he's succeeded.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
